code: export var PaymentConnectorPostMessageType;(function(PaymentConnectorPostMessageType){PaymentConnectorPostMessageType["CardPrefix"]="msax-cc-cardprefix";PaymentConnectorPostMessageType["Error"]="msax-cc-error";PaymentConnectorPostMessageType["Height"]="msax-cc-height";PaymentConnectorPostMessageType["Result"]="msax-cc-result";PaymentConnectorPostMessageType["Submit"]="msax-cc-submit";PaymentConnectorPostMessageType["ExtraContext"]="msax-cc-extracontext";PaymentConnectorPostMessageType["Redirect"]="msax-cc-redirect";PaymentConnectorPostMessageType["Showoverlay"]="msax-cc-showoverlay";PaymentConnectorPostMessageType["Hideoverlay"]="msax-cc-hideoverlay";})(PaymentConnectorPostMessageType||(PaymentConnectorPostMessageType={}));export function paymentConnectorMessage(data,messageType){return{message:JSON.stringify({type:messageType,value:data}),targetOrigin:'*'};}export function paymentConnectorExtraContextMessage(data){return paymentConnectorMessage(data,PaymentConnectorPostMessageType.ExtraContext);}export function paymentConnectorSubmitMessage(){return paymentConnectorMessage('true',PaymentConnectorPostMessageType.Submit);}
